content: X-Cut Thin Stainless & Steel circular saw blade Top-performance circular saw blade with cermet teeth to cut faster and last longer in stainless and steel sheet metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti’s ultimate circular saw blades for metal sheet and other thin metals, engineered to help you get the job done faster and cut more with the same blade 66 cermet carbide teeth help you saw rapidly and smoothly through all stainless and steel sheet metals More cuts per charge – the blade’s ultra-thin kerf minimizes energy consumption, so you can cut up to 450% more per battery charge in sheet metal Longer-lasting blades – our longest circular saw blade lifetime ever, thanks to revolutionary X-Cut technology and top-grade materials Applications Cutting all sheet metal, including stainless steel Optimized for cutting flat metal, sandwich panel, trapeze roofing, C-channels, square and round piping Cold, fast, straight cuts with minimal sparks Cutting clean edges in steel with limited burr ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade features: Clean cut, Cold cut, Long life, Special for cordless, Ultra thin kerf technology, Cermet tipped Blade diameter: 6.5 in Number of teeth: 66 Technical Data | Blade features | Clean cut, Cold cut, Long life, Special for cordless, Ultra thin kerf technology, Cermet tipped | Blade diameter | 6.5 in | Number of teeth | 66 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3895547 - SCBM Xcut Thin 6.5 (2-pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x Circ. saw blade SCBM XCut Thin 6.5 A
